caption: Images from @gilberttrejo38’s short film on the Ninth Annual Art+Film Gala presented by #Gucci to support @lacma’s initiative to make film more central to the museum’s curatorial programming. #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm @alessandro_michele

Actor and director @gilberttrejo38’s short film documents @lacma’s 2019 Art+Film Gala from the
attendees’ arrival to @anderson._paak’s special performance. @alessandro_michele
#AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

At the 2019 Art+Film Gala, guests @siennathing, @jaredleto, @zoesaldana and @salmahayek Pinault and honorees #BetyeSaar and @alfonsocuaron—captured in images from @gilberttrejo38’s short film on the soirée. @lacma #artandfilm @alessandro_michele #AlessandroMichele

@brielarson in a #Gucci velvet and organza gown with satin duchesse bow and embroidered details at the 2019 Art+Film Gala. #BrieLarson completed her look with a selection of #GucciJewelry pieces designed by @alessandro_michele. Discover more through link in bio. #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

A guest at @lacma’s 2019 Art+Film Gala, Gia Coppola @mastergia wore a #GucciSS19 velvet and antique gold satin gown with fake fur sleeves and a #GucciZumi mini bag designed by
@alessandro_michele. Discover more through link in bio. #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

@troubleandrew and @santigold at the ninth annual Art+Film Gala supported by #Gucci. #TrevorAndrew wore a Gucci Monaco jacket, dress shirt and pants with velvet piping. #Santigold wore a #GucciSS20 sequin embroidered dress, lace tights, leather pumps and a selection of #GucciJewelry pieces designed by @alessandro_michele. Discover more through link in bio. #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

Attending @lacma’s 2019 Art+Film Gala supported by #Gucci, @yarashahidi wore a #GucciCruise20 pleated silk one-shoulder gown, #GucciJewelry lion head earrings and ring in yellow gold, emeralds, opals and diamonds. Discover more through link in bio. @alessandro_michele #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

Guests at @lacma’s 2019 Art+Film Gala: @anderson._paak—who performed during the event, @salmahayek Pinault, #Gucci Creative Director @alessandro_michele, Gucci President and CEO #MarcoBizzarri and #François-Henri Pinault, Chairman and CEO of @kering_official. Discover more through link in bio. #artandfilm #AlessandroMichele

To the ninth annual Art+Film Gala, @iamreginaking wearing a sequin embroidered gown with contrast belt with crystal detail from #GucciFW19 by @alessandro_michele. Discover more through link in bio. @lacma #artandfilm

@cynthiaerivo attending @lacma’s 2019 Art+Film Gala in a #Gucci silk V-neck gown with frog-closure detail and a sequin clutch with crystal butterfly closure. Discover more through link in bio. @alessandro_michele #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

@zoesaldana in a #Gucci silk georgette and tulle gown with lace inserts and butterfly embroidery at @lacma’s 2019 Art+Film Gala. #ZoeSaldana completed her look with a selection of #GucciHighJewelry pieces designed by @alessandro_michele. Discover more through link in bio. #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

To the ninth annual Art+Film Gala supported by #Gucci, @asia_chow wore a #Gucci velvet gown with crystal embroideries designed by @alessandro_michele. Discover more through link in bio. #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm @lacma

Guests at the @lacma 2019 Art+Film Gala, @lauradern and #GretaGerwig. #LauraDern wore a #Gucci silk dress with lace sleeves, butterfly appliqué, yellow sequin embroidered. Greta Gerwig wore a silk cape dress with multicolor beaded embroidery from #GucciSS19 by @alessandro_michele. #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

At @lacma’s Art+Film Gala, #Gucci President and CEO #MarcoBizzarri, Creative Director @alessandro_michele, artist #BetyeSaar, #MichaelGovan, LACMA CEO and Wallis Annenberg Director, Eva Chow, co-chair of the Art+Film Gala and film director, screenwriter, producer, and editor @alfonsocuaron. #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

Film director @paolosorrentino_real and Gucci Creative Director @alessandro_michele captured together at @lacma’s Art+Film Gala. Proceeds from the event will support LACMA’s film initiatives and future exhibitions, acquisitions, and programming. #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm
Photo by @bradelterman

Tyler, the Creator @feliciathegoat attended the ninth annual Art+Film Gala in a wool V-neck sweater, striped dress shirt and a silk moiré tie from #GucciPreFall19 by @alessandro_michele. #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

Captured in front of ‘Urban Light’ at the @lacma 2019 Art+Film Gala supported by #Gucci, @susiecaveofficial, @nickcaveofficial and Earl Cave @psychoearli, all in #Gucci by @alessandro_michele. #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

#DonaldGlover @childishgambino at the @lacma 2019 Art+Film Gala wearing a #Gucci floral jacquard Heritage jacket, crêpe de chine shirt with self-fabric bow, tuxedo trousers with satin detail and leather Horsebit chain loafers. @alessandro_michele #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

A guest at @lacma’s 2019 Art+Film Gala, #AmandlaStenberg @amandlasponsored in a #GucciFW19 velvet dress with silk plissé bustier and cape, leather sandals and a #LeMarchédesMerveilles ring with feline head detail in yellow gold, aged sterling silver, sapphires and rubies. @alessandro_michele #AlessandroMichele #artandfilm

@beck and @jaredleto captured together at the ninth annual Art+Film Gala. #Beck wore a #Gucci velvet two button peak lapel suit, silk shirt and black leather boots. #JaredLeto wore a #GucciSS20 velvet jacket with grosgrain contrast lapel, ribbed tank top, cropped pants, leather boots and square-frame #GucciEyewear sunglasses. #artandfilm @alessandro_michele #AlessandroMichele @lacma
